headline: Show HN: Quick Cursor – One hand mode for Android. New edge actions feature
description:
Hi everyone!

I've released the new edge actions feature for Quick Cursor today. Preview:https://i.imgur.com/XYjaZzY.mp4

The app has a free version without ads, which is limited in terms of configurations and features, but can be tested to see if it helps you use your phone: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.quickcurso...

The pro version is an IAP (In-app purchase) and offers a lot more customizations on features and looks. The app is made for power users that want many customizations.

Any feedback is welcomed!

Thanks!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 快速光标--安卓的单手模式。新的边缘动作功能
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 快速光標--安卓的單手模式。新的邊緣動作功能
